actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the committee appointed to arrange for, and attend the funeral of the Honorable Hubert H. Humphrey, late a Senator from the State of Minnesota.

summary.text: Directs the payment of expenses incurred by the committee which arranged for and attended the funeral of the Honorable Hubert H. Humphrey.

titles.title: A resolution relative to the expenses incurred by the committee appointed to arrange for, and attend the funeral of the Honorable Hubert H. Humphrey, late a Senator from the State of Minnesota.
